title: The Art Show Heist
logline: Jason, Kenny, and Stacey attempt to steal Jason’s own commissioned painting back from the guarded art show. The plan collapses instantly, triggering a chaotic foot chase that ends with an unexpected confrontation outside Jason’s studio.

setting.location: Art Show — Exterior and Interior, Downtown
setting.environment: Daytime; large gallery space with bright walls; energetic atmosphere with visitors and a stationed security guard.

KENNY.objective: Create a distraction—unwittingly serving as bait.

STACEY.objective: Capture the unfolding chaos and stay with Jason’s team.

FRANKLIN_B_STEVENSON.objective: Reveal his motives and reassert control over the narrative.

SECURITY_GUARD.objective: Stop any attempt to steal the painting.

story_beats.description: Kenny psychs himself up outside the art show.
Kenny charges in to steal the painting.
Their scuffle creates an opening; Jason seizes the painting and bolts.
Jason tries to escape via truck but the broken key fob fails.
Jason, Kenny, and Stacey sprint 12 blocks back to the studio with the painting.
They arrive only to find Catherine and Franklin waiting outside.
Franklin reveals he orchestrated the mugging; he returns Kenny’s stolen phone and cash.
Franklin asks them all to go inside so he can explain everything.

dialogue.line: (to himself) Fast— move fast.
Okay, let’s get my painting back.
Yep, I’m gonna grab it.
What’s that guy up to?
(under his breath) You’re coming with me.
Nope.
Not today buddy.
Run!
Haha! You fucked up!
SHIT!
Why are we running?
My fucking key fob took a shit!
What do you mean— you sacrificed me to that guy?
Sorry. I figured you’d distract him long enough for me to grab the painting.
You prick! You could have told me.
Jason, you’re back. You’ve all been such busy little bees.
What are you doing here?
I’m here to introduce you to the buyer, Franklin B. Stevenson.
That’s the guy who robbed us! Where’s my phone asshole!?
Hi Jason… Kenny… Stacey.
You scammed me! This is my painting— the deal is off.
No, the deal is still valid.
Are you deaf? No deal!
Kenny— stop. Here’s your phone, and the thirty bucks you handed over in the tunnel.
Sweet! …Why the hell did you rob us?
It was part of the story we were creating together.
You robbed us for the doc?
Yes I did. We all need to talk. Shall we all go inside?
Um… I guess. Sure, let’s hear it.

setup_payoffs.Stacey’s loyalty: She runs with Jason instead of alerting Franklin.
setup_payoffs.Franklin’s mugging: Revealed to be staged and intentional.
